actions.action: Click on "Personale" label on the left (must be two or more personnels into the module)
Edit at least one field, then duble click on another personnel from the grid

responses.response: PersonnelEditor_Dijit, dataGridWidget double click on personnel

Click on "Si" on dialog panel and "Ok" on the next one
